content.question: European liberals in the first half of the nineteenth century typically supported

choices.label: the right of workers to unionize and strike
a written constitution and wider suffrage
the establishment of overseas colonies to improve conditions at home

content.answer: a written constitution and wider suffrage

topic.text: 6.7: Ideologies of Change and Reform Movements

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
